title: Colors
sentences: The sky is very blue today because it's sunny.
Do you prefer the red apple or the green one?
Look at those white clouds in the sky.
The night is very black and I don't see anything.
The trees are green in spring.
My new shoes are brown and very comfortable.
The sun is big and yellow.
I really like the pink roses from my aunt's garden.
My cat is gray and has big eyes.
El zumo de naranja es de color
I bought some very sweet purple grapes at the market.
She has a very expensive gold ring.
El coche de mi padre es
My father's car is silver and very fast.
Chocolate is brown and tastes very delicious.
I drew a red heart in my notebook for you.
dictionary:
El color - The color
El azul - Blue
El rojo - Red
El verde - Green
El blanco - White
El negro - Black
El amarillo - Yellow
El gris - Gray
El naranja - Orange
El marrón - Brown
El rosa - Pink
El morado - Purple
El dorado - Gold
El plateado - Silver
